Articles.Content:
Simple what else you playing or have played of note

-KSP

-Eve Online (on and off)

-SD Gundam online

-Battlefield 3 on the 360

Well as of right now:

- KSP

- Batman Arkham Asylum: GOTY (360)

- Mass Effect (PC)

Games I have saves going for that I play from time to time:

- Galciv II (human Immense galaxy, epic battles ftw!)

- ROTK XI (with my fav created characters)

- Crusader Kings II (with a created family that I pretend to be a part of {German land owners in spain})

- Minecraft (Mainly vanilla with a few, minor mods)

- SimCity 4 (vanilla, I find it more challenging)

- Railroad Tycoon II (Taking over North America from texas)

- Europa Universalis III (As Great Britain, have stopped major powers from discovering new world. Mainly for the lulz. Also, Holy Roman Emperor)

Thinking of Getting:

- Tropico 4 (Looks like a lot of fun!)

- Tomb Raider (long time fan of the series)

- Batman Arkham City (When GOTY comes out)

- ME 2 (When I finish 1)

- ME 3 (When I finish 2)

I'll start where you did.

-KSP (pc)

-Eve Online (Been playing since beta, still bounce back and forth.)

-Battlefield 3

-Guild Wars 2

-Mechwarrior Online (Beta)

-World Of Tanks

-Civ5 (Multiplayer)

Occasionally (xbox)

-Skyrim

-Fallout Series

-XCom Enemy Unknown

-Ultima Forever

A couple of other beta's I can't mention.

I'll start where you did.

A couple of other beta's I can't mention.

Aurora. It's a space-based extremely complex 4X game. If you can get over the learning cliff it's great. It's free, check the installation forum for the files. It's still a bit buggy since the game is a hobby so he works on what he feels like when he feels like it, but they're not generally too bad.

http://www.pcworld.com/article/243397/aurora_an_intense_game_of_intergalactic_exploration_and_expansion.html

I also play World of Tanks.

Edited October 5, 2012 by Person012345

What is Endless Space? MWO is a ton of fun when you play with someone else. My buddy and I get on teamspeak and run around in Jenners at 138kph and typically end with 300-700 dmg done and a ton of kills/assists. They need to add more game modes though.

You don't know about Endless Space? I'm shocked ... It's Master of Orion 2 in pretty with boring fleet fights

http://store.steampowered.com/app/208140/?snr=1_7_suggest__13

I don't know if it's worth 30Ã¢â€šÂ¬ but as discounted preorder it was well worth it. (50 hrs)
